unit.utterance: [The interviewer is asking if the Arta speaker give him a speech of congratulations for his wedding party.]
unit.utterance_translation: [The interviewer is asking if the Arta speaker give him a speech of congratulations for his wedding party.]

unit.utterance: Aytay, amma ayta Arta, munataw,
unit.utterance_translation: Now, if you would be

unit.utterance: tidi daddu:pu:i na arta,
unit.utterance_translation: with old Arta men,

unit.utterance: [The interviewer asks the speaker to stop for a while to fix the video camera.]
unit.utterance_translation: [The interviewer asks the speaker to stop for a while to fix the video camera.]

unit.utterance: "Mepeppiya i gimtènmuyu amma tam a passa:sawa, i mangibbumbu:lun.
unit.utterance_translation: "what you are going to do is great if both of you, the couple, are together."

unit.utterance: Aydi:, pi:piyanmuyu i pangi:topmuyu; awa:ngam mangisubèsubèg,
unit.utterance_translation: and if you develop your relationship; if you do not quarrel,

unit.utterance: Awanmu ginaginanan asawamuy,
unit.utterance_translation: and if you do not desert your wife.

unit.utterance: Pi:piyanmu a uman na mapi:piya ta to:topmu
unit.utterance_translation: Develop (it) as if you develop it as your partner.

unit.utterance: aydi: maski adin i e:nanmu,
unit.utterance_translation: And wherever you go,

unit.utterance: Syempre siyate: no:no:tènmu, siyate: ka:kabbatmu, awandi ta tanakwan.
unit.utterance_translation: needless to say, it is her that you should think of, it is her that you love, not others.

unit.utterance: Aydi: amma atti: man ni pa:ngisu:subganmuyu, (pa:ngisu:subgan (?))
unit.utterance_translation: And if you quarrel over something,

unit.utterance: Syempre tam a tallip a tami, mangibbu:bud.
unit.utterance_translation: needless to say, you should talk with each other for a solution;

unit.utterance: a awandi ta tanakwan da tam a tallip i minangikkabbbat.
unit.utterance_translation: not with other people, because it is you that love each other;

unit.utterance: Tam a tallipi nanggimit ta kabbatmuyu a gimtanmuyu a familiamuyu a tallipµ
unit.utterance_translation: it is you two that decided that you will make your falimy of the two.

unit.utterance: i ma mansiwèdam a tallip, Diosminate."
unit.utterance_translation: If you should be separated, (there is) only God (who could save you).

unit.utterance: Panga:nan na arta, "meddèsi ginananmu i asawam, meddèsi mangibuka:gantaw, meddèsi uminom ta binara:yan, meddèsi su:subganmu i aturanganmu,
unit.utterance_translation: There is how Arta people do it: "it is bad for you to desert your wife/husband; it is bad for you to find another woman; it is bad to drink alcohol; it is bad to have trouble with your parents-in-law"

unit.utterance: Aydi: ipe:tam ta ana:mu awantaw i ama."
unit.utterance_translation: and see for your child that you are not a (good) father.

unit.utterance: messingpèt, tawya amma
unit.utterance_translation: You be virtuous [cut-off sentence]

unit.utterance: Panga:nandi a "mepeppiya amma awanmu a itanatanakwan."
unit.utterance_translation: according to them, "it is good if you give your child to others.

unit.utterance: Saya i nibud na nadupu:ya, a angaya:ngu, a mepeppiya a gimitènta.
unit.utterance_translation: These are what old men told me when I visited him, for us to behave in a virtuous way.

unit.utterance: "Maski madupu:ita, maski mababakatita, basta kabbat na gissa gissa tita, ki:gad ta ki:gad ta mappatiita." Munata.
unit.utterance_translation: "Even when we become old men, old women, she will love only you, until, until we die."
